name: 曾釋鋒
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。概念性的介紹精密機電系統以及精密加工程序，工件精密度介紹，誤差與公差 (尺寸精度、組裝誤差)，移動平台 (XY-Stage) 之選用，滾珠螺桿與線性滑軌選用與承重計算，真直度與平行度介紹，位置控制與馬達選用。
This course will mainly introduce the concepts of precision mechanical systems and precision fabrication process. The concepts of mechanical errors and tolerance of products and the key points of selecting of XY-stages, driving units, ball screws, and linear motion elements will be also introduced in this course.
